Sentencas: In multi-component materials, triple phase boundary (TPB) is the location where reactions occur.
Titulo: Geometrical triple phase boundary length measurement using focused ion beam tomography

Sentencas: A typical example is the TPB encountered in solid oxide fuel cells at the cathodeelectrolyte interface.
Titulo: Geometrical triple phase boundary length measurement using focused ion beam tomography

Sentencas: We proposed a tomographic approach that was developed based on serial sectioning using a focused dual ion beam (FIB) system.
Titulo: Geometrical triple phase boundary length measurement using focused ion beam tomography

Sentencas: For image capture, FIB tomography was coupled with scanning electron microscopy, and differentiation of the composite cathode materials was possible through image contrast adjustment.
Titulo: Geometrical triple phase boundary length measurement using focused ion beam tomography

Sentencas: An algorithm, built on the HoshenKopelman theory, was then applied to measure TPB length.
Titulo: Geometrical triple phase boundary length measurement using focused ion beam tomography

Sentencas: The percentage of the connected TPB line was also calculated with the algorithm for 3D computation.
Titulo: Geometrical triple phase boundary length measurement using focused ion beam tomography
